title: Interpretation of photography in a dream and seeing a photographer in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream of a single person being depicted by a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man. The image in a dream is one of the dreams that we see constantly in our dreams, and we need a correct interpretation to know the reason for the vision or dream and the sign it brings us in public life, as images are among the things that we are accustomed to. In our public life, which brings us many old or new memories that we document through photography, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream as interpreted by the translator Ibn Katheer in his interpretations.Interpretation of photography in a dreamA photography studio may indicate entering places infested with diseases or places of detention and torture.Interpretation Pictures in a dreamSeeing pictures in a dream is evidence that there are people who are disloyal to you in public life. Pictures in a dream also show that there are people who carry a lot of hatred and resentment, which is what they need to know in life. The picture in a dream indicates that there is someone who is trying to destroy Your life. Preparing some pictures in a dream indicates that the dreamer is busy with many important tasks. Pictures in a dream, evidence of an attempt to finish all the work that a person is doing. Interpretation of personal pictures in a dream Seeing personal pictures in a dream means expressing yourself in front of him. Also, the Seeing very beautiful selfies in a dream indicates that the dreamer has high self-esteem. Seeing an ugly selfie in a dream means that he is an ugly person and does many bad things. The dreamer seeing his photo is not complete in the dream, is evidence that his life is very bad. Interpretation of photos in A dream for a single woman: Seeing single women buying some pictures in a dream means that he has many dreams and desires that he wants to fulfill. For an unmarried woman to see that her picture is much higher, is evidence that she will take a high position in her work and succeed. Interpretation of taking pictures in a dreamSingles who take pictures of themselves in Dreaming about using a front camera is evidence that they are suffering from the illusions they are living in. An unmarried woman who takes pictures with the front camera in a dream indicates that she will suffer from severe weakness. Seeing an unmarried woman talking about her bad selfie in a dream is evidence that she is on the path to The error in Ibn Sirin’s view of images - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the funeral of an already dead person according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of a dead person’s funeral for a period of time has several pieces of evidence mentioned by some interpretation scholars, but unfortunately most of them go in the direction of worries and burdens accumulating on a person in his real life, and there are many events that will happen to him, including positive ones according to the details. Let us now learn about what the commentators have concluded. Interpretation of the vision Ibn Sirin in the funeral of a dead person. Interpretation of seeing the funeral of a dead person. This dream indicates that the dreamer’s life is not going well and there is something that pushes him to adopt some negative thoughts that make him deviate from the right path and not reach the desired goal. If this person is his father, then in reality it may be negligence. In his right, and his father died while he was dissatisfied with him, which requires him to ask forgiveness and constantly offer alms to his father’s soul to please him and raise his rank. With his Lord. Some interpretation scholars said that the dream indicates that he is exposed to a financial crisis, especially if he is a merchant and has projects or deals, then he must prepare to bear some losses. But if it is an unmarried girl, then she is unfortunately living in a bad psychological state, mainly due to her failure to Her emotional life or her inability to form healthy social relationships with others. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision at the funeral of a dead person. Ibn Sirin said that seeing death again is a sign On the bad things that the dreamer is going through in his life, and that he is facing many difficulties that he does not have the energy or ability to deal with. Seeing him walking around carrying the coffin of someone he knew well who had died was interpreted as an attempt to provide a service to the family of that dead person or to marry his daughters in the future. If he is a student, things get worse in his studies and he cannot catch up with his colleagues, which makes him feel like a failure and frustrated. Interpretation of seeing a dead person’s funeral for a single woman: If she planned some study or work ambitions, there are some obstacles that appear before her and do not make things go as planned, and if she feels hopeless From the first round, she may withdraw from her target. Optimism. If she is engaged, there are problems between her and her fiancé, and she is thinking about divorcing him due to the discomfort and lack of equality in thinking between them. In any case, divorce now is much better than waiting until consummation and discovering the lack of understanding between them. As for studying, she is suffering in some subjects and she is not optimistic about taking the exams now, but she needs more focus and staying away from things that contribute to distracting her. Interpretation of seeing a married woman’s funeral, seeing a dead woman Being reburied again is a sign of the problems she is going through with her husband, and this difficult time must be dealt with calmly so as not to lose her security and stability with her husband and children. If she is found crying at the funeral, then she is repenting of a great sin she committed, but she repented and turned to her Lord. If The deceased is her husband. She is still suffering from intense sadness over his separation, and at the same time she does not find in herself the ability to bear these new burdens that are added to her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married man

preview.html: And the dreamer seeing that he was marrying a Jewish or Christian woman in a dream, this is a sign of the sins he is committing and the mistakes he is committing, and the dream of marrying a sharp woman indicates trouble and we will show you more interpretations through our translator’s website, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing the wedding of a married man in a dream For a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is witnessing her marriage to someone she did not know before, and she rejoices in the dream. Here it shows that a good man will propose to her and make her happy. And keep her alive, God willing, and she will be happy with him. And seeing an unmarried girl in a dream That she was looking at a married husband, and he married her in a dream, and she was very happy with him. Here she says that she is in a relationship with a person who does not fit her life. And that she has other goals and dreams far from her, she should care about that. And seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is looking forward to marrying a man Married in a dream, and she was very sad about the delay of this marriage. This is an indication that this single girl will face a difficult situation in her life. It will affect her greatly, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wedding in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a married man marrying a woman in a dream Married: If a married woman sees in a dream that she will marry again to a married man and she feels very happy with him in her dream. This is an indication that this married woman will face problems in her life that will affect her during this time. And if the married woman looks at the married man proposing to her in the dream and wants to He marries her while he does not want to. This is evidence of her great love for her husband and her great devotion to him in his absence and presence, and the state of understanding that exists between them. A married woman who sees that she is waiting for a married man to propose to her in order to marry her in a dream and rejoices. It shows the good things that this married woman expects In her life. And she will live happily, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a married man’s wedding in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is looking at a married man. He wanted to marry her in a dream and he was very happy in the dream about this. It shows that she will soon marry a good man. He suits her and makes her Happy in her life, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that she is looking for a married man to marry him in the dream and her sadness. This is explained by the presence of a man in her life that she does not understand, and she will suffer a lot from being with him in life and will overcome him a lot. And the divorced dreamer who sees in the dream that the man The married man wants her to get married in a dream and he accepts this matter. This is an indication that there is a new and difficult issue that this divorced woman will go through in her life and will suffer from his presence for a long time. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about forced marriage and the crying of a single woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase is evidence of the existence of certain problems and crises that the dreamer is going through, and the interpretation of this vision may differ depending on the dreamer’s condition, situation, and the context of the dream. We will.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a broken staircase. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a staircase in a dream with many different interpretations, which were derived based on the shape and position of the staircase. Ibn Sirin said that if one sees a broken staircase in his dream, this vision may be a sign of some troubles and problems. In the dreamer's life. This vision may also indicate that the viewer will be exposed to a very major crisis in the coming period. Ibn Sirin explained that the breaking of the ladder is a sign of failure and failure to achieve dreams, desires and goals. It can also indicate anxiety and worry that the viewer will feel in his life. Interpretation of seeing a broken ladder in a girl’s dream for a single woman. Different dream interpretation scholars have explained many different and diverse interpretations of seeing broken stairs. Therefore, the interpretation of a dream about cutting stairs in a dream for a single woman can be known as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is climbing a broken staircase, then this vision is considered evidence of the presence of major problems that this girl will face in the coming period. But if the girl sees an unmarried woman A married woman sees in her dream a broken ladder and is still studying, then this vision is considered a sign of this girl’s failure and her failure or failure to obtain high grades in her studies. Many commentators said that if a girl sees a broken ladder in her dream, then this vision indicates that this girl is committing A lot of sins and disobedience, and she must repent and return to the right path. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is climbing a broken staircase with her lover, then this vision is considered a sign of the failure and severance of her relationship with her lover. But if a girl sees her friend climbing a broken staircase in her dream, This vision is a warning to the girl, because her friend is going in the wrong direction and she must stay away from her. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase in a married woman’s dream. Interpreters have confirmed that the interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a married woman differs from its interpretation for an unmarried girl, and from here we will learn about the most prominent interpretations of this dream for a married woman. As follows: If a married woman sees in her dream that the stairs in her house are cut off or broken, then this vision indicates that she will face a problem in her home that will lead to the demolition of the house. This vision may also indicate that there are some disputes between the woman and her husband that may lead to divorce. If she climbs If a woman sees broken stairs, then this vision is a sign that she will soon suffer from a serious health problem. Dream interpretation scholars have explained that if a married woman sees a broken ladder in her dream, then this vision is a sign that she will be exposed to a major financial crisis in the coming period. But if the woman sees a broken ladder in her dream, this vision is a sign that she will be exposed to a major financial crisis in the coming period. A married woman saw a broken ladder in her dream and her children were climbing it, then this vision indicates that her children are going in the opposite direction.

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from dough

preview.html: In this article, we will tell you the most important interpretations related to this vision from our interpreter site, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from dough in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is removing her hair from dough. It seemed as if he was getting rid of her worries, chasing her and trying to get rid of them all the time. Seeing hair in the dough that is not very visible indicates the envy of a relative and it takes her life. It is the cause of her misery and sorrows, so she must submit to God and draw near to Him. If a girl finds more than one hair in the dough, point out the difficulties she faces in her life, one after the other. Seeing hair on the dough and then disappearing, this indicates the problems that a single woman faces. But it quickly fades and disappears from her life. If a girl sees white hair in the dough, this indicates a new and happy life. It also indicates that she is getting engaged to a man who will protect her and love her. And if An unmarried woman was removing her hair from the dough, as this indicates the disappearance of her worries and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing single people cutting their hair after being expelled from the dough indicates recovery from the diseases that afflict the girl and her life will return to normal. See also: Interpretation of a dream about dough by hand for unmarried women, pregnant women, and divorced women. Interpretation Seeing a woman removing hair from dough in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman: There was hair in the dough, so she removed it with her hand, and her hands were full of hair. This indicates the problems and difficulties that she and her husband will face, and God knows best. If the married woman saw the dough in front of her, it was full of black hair. The sign To envy or eye injury to her and her family by her relatives. Seeing hair remover paste but with great difficulty. We refer to the illness of the married woman, and it is difficult to recover, and God knows best. If the married woman sees that she is cutting the paste and finds a hair in it and removes it easily, this indicates the loss of sorrows and troubles. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from dough for a man and its meaning. A man who sees hair in dough indicates a disease affecting that person’s body, but he recovers soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It may indicate a major loss in his money or a deal he is involved in, and he will not be able to compensate for all these losses, and God knows best. If a man sees colored hairs in the dough and pulls them out, this shows that he is a man who loves women, but he will pass through this stage and become more balanced in his relationships with women. Seeing hairs in the dough and not being able to pull them out indicates a problem that threatens his marital life, and God knows best. If the hair is removed Easily removed from the dough, this indicates the collapse of his life’s problems and the stability of his family. Read also: Dough in a dream is good news. The meaning of seeing hair removed from the dough in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is cutting dough and finds hair inside it. Remember the bad condition that she is going through during pregnancy. It symbolizes the pain that accompanies a woman throughout pregnancy. If a pregnant girl sees hair in the dough, she will simply pluck it. This indicates that she has passed the pregnancy period and portends a natural and easy birth. See the matter.

title: Interpretation of seeing wearing an engagement dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream? Asking questions about dream interpretations has become very popular in all search engines and communication sites. Once the question is asked, the questioner finds many interpretations of his dream, but this interpretation can be true or false, because no matter how honest astrologers are, they are liars, because the science of dream interpretation is very broad. It has many details that the interpreter must realize about the owner of the dream or vision, as its interpretation varies from one person to another depending on his social life, the living conditions in which he lives, his work conditions, and his relationships. With those around him. Engagement dress in a dream We will try to provide you with an encyclopedia of interpretations that may or may not be correct. In the end, God Almighty is the All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing an engagement dress in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing yourself wearing an engagement dress in a dream can be one of the things that raises doubts in the minds of many, especially if the dreamer is already married or engaged and about to get married, Likewise, a divorced woman, but because each person has his own life and its details, and the interpretation and interpretation of seeing an engagement dress in a dream differs, and from one to another. Below we will learn about some of the interpretations suggested by the most famous dream interpreters. Ibn Sirin says that seeing an unmarried girl wearing an engagement dress It indicates that the suitable husband will propose to her, and that she will marry him and marry him, God willing. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dreamer’s vision as wearing an open engagement dress, indicating that she will be exposed to some troubles and this may lead to losing her money. Seeing her wearing a modest engagement dress is evidence of The dreamer enjoys health, cover, and purity, that she is close to God, that her life will be better, and that she has good and gentle behavior among people. Some interpreters said that seeing a girl wearing a long engagement dress means that she will get a good job and will have a bright future. Seeing buying an engagement dress and paying Easy money, which indicates that the dreamer will get rid of all the problems he is going through, and you will hear good news. Interpretation of a dream about an engagement dress for the fiancée: The engaged girl may be surprised by wearing or buying the engagement dress, so how will she wear the engagement dress again, and leave her fiancé or face problems between them, and what Below we will present to you the explanations of the most famous commentators. Interpretation scholars interpreted that if the fiancée sees herself wearing her engagement dress again, this indicates that her wedding date is near and that God will grant her a peaceful life. Some dream interpreters said that if the fiancée sees herself wearing the engagement dress, but Its color is white, this symbolizes that her married life is full of happiness, tranquility, closeness to God, and obedience to Him. If the fiancée sees herself wearing a pink engagement dress, this indicates the strength of understanding and mutual dependence between her and her fiancé and that their relationship with each other is a strong relationship built on understanding. Some believe If the fiancée sees herself wearing a short or revealing engagement dress, then...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me

preview.html: But what does a cat attack in a dream, and the interpretation varies according to its color and size? This is what we will discover in the following lines from our translator, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a black cat attacking me in a dream about a single girl. Seeing cats in one dream indicates the characteristics of the future fiancé, which are often difficult and unlovable. When a girl sees in her dream that she has turned into A cat, then this is a sign that the fortuneteller has feline qualities of kindness and pride. To dream of a cat falling in love with an unmarried woman, means that there is a deceitful person trying to get close to her for evil purposes. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a white cat. Interpretation of seeing a black cat attacking me in a dream about Married woman: It is said that a married male cat in a dream is a bad omen, but a cat is good news for an imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Seeing many cats in a married woman’s dream is a sign to warn those around her of bad intentions and harboring jealousy and hatred. Small cats in a married woman’s dream represent her young children, care and attention. Which they need, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a black cat attacking me in a dream about a man and its meaning. The male cat in a man’s dream represents a thief. The female cat symbolizes the pampered and cheerful woman who is trying to seduce the fortuneteller. Calm pet cats in a man’s dream, symbolize psychological comfort and stability of life. Also Colored cats are good news on the road. A cat bite in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be cheated and robbed by a fraudster, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing a black cat attacking me in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing cats in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the visions that reassures her of the health of her pregnancy and portends With an easy and natural birth, God willing. Seeing a small cat playing in a dream is a sign of the birth of a very light and intelligent child, and God knows best. Likewise, an apricot cat in a dream represents the birth of a beautiful and cute girl, while a yellow cat indicates fatigue and illness. Interpretation of seeing a black cat attacking me in A dream for young people and its meaning. Ibn Shaheen says that the appearance of cats in the sleep of young people is a sign of problems and disagreements between the fortuneteller and his family because of their cruelty to him and their lack of interest in him. Sheikh Al-Dulaimi says that the cat in the dream of a single young man is evidence of loneliness and emotional emptiness, especially if he escapes from it in the dream. Enjoying cats in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many romantic relationships. A cat bite in a dream is also a trauma, to be experienced at the hands of a woman. Interpretation of a dream about a cat talking to me in a dream Talking to a cat in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from weak character. She is mentally disturbed and needs a specialized psychiatrist. It is also said that talking to cats in a dream is evidence that the dreamer prefers isolation. He does not want new people in his life. Interpretation scholars say that seeing a cat talking to the dreamer in a dream is an unpleasant vision, and expresses obsessions. The many devils of the pioneer. Interpretation of seeing cats mating in a dream. Cats mating naturally in a dream is one of the good things that portends success and prosperity for the viewer in his life in general. Also, cat mating

title: Interpretation of dreams of canceling an engagement for a single, unengaged woman

preview.html: From your website gptafser.com/, we present to you what is the interpretation of this vision in all cases and what is the opinion of its interpreters: is it praiseworthy or rejected in the case of single people, men, pregnant women, and married and married women? Young people, singles, and divorced women. Interpretation of seeing a broken engagement in a dream for a single girl. Breaking off an unmarried girl’s engagement in her dream. She declares her desire to meet all her needs that she desires in life, God willing. The vision also indicates his intense striving to achieve success and high distinction. Some scholars believe that this vision indicates On the failure of an unmarried girl. In his scientific or practical field, and God Almighty is above everything. Or her being exposed to a financial crisis or a difficult obstacle in her life, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream means breaking off her engagement. Evidence of this girl’s feeling of optimism and happiness because of her promotion or She obtained a new job. The indications of this vision are promising for the unmarried girl to enter into a love relationship. Some scholars interpreted this vision as wrong decisions on the part of the unmarried girl. It is as if she is making a decision that harms her life or her studies that she will regret, and God knows best. Seeing one girl in a dream, This vision more than once is evidence that there are evil people around her who wish her harm, and God knows best. The vision is a message to her to be careful of these hateful and jealous people. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that her family is the reason for breaking off the engagement. Evidence of her quick and reckless decisions. And God Almighty is All-Knowing. It also refers to seeing her in a dream serving tea to another person. Proving that the stage of courtship is not successful and ends because there is something better than it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about getting engaged in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing an engagement broken off in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in Her dream that her engagement was broken off is evidence that there are enemies around her who are conspiring against her, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Or that her married life is exposed to difficult problems and crises, and God knows best. This vision in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of family disturbances that will disappear after a while, God willing. Breaking off the engagement in a dream For a married woman, it is evidence of her quick decisions. Which she regrets because you did not study it well, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream that her engagement has been broken off is evidence of new social relationships in her next life, God willing. A married woman seeing this vision indicates that she is exposed to psychological tensions. Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing an engagement ring. Good news that he will find a new lucrative job, God willing. If he works, the vision indicates that he will gain a great position and status, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a broken engagement in a man’s dream and its meaning. If you see a man in a dream that he broke off his engagement This means that he will be exposed to psychological pressure. Or he will be exposed to a difficult financial crisis and many problems, and God knows best. A man seeing in his dream that he wants to divorce his wife. This proves that he has a desire to separate, and God knows best. Or the presence of marital disputes or his desire to get rid of some problems. A married man seeing in his dream that he broke off his engagement is evidence that he is in trouble

title: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in cloudy water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of drowning in cloudy water in a dream. In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream of drowning in cloudy water in a dream, we present all of this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream of drowning in cloudy water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of drowning in turbid water in a dream can To indicate undesirable things, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees sweat in the water in a dream, he can express anxiety and sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself drowning in turbid water, it may lead to evil, and God knows best. When a single girl sees himself drowning in water Cloudy in a dream, this may represent a problem, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of drinking dirty water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of drinking dirty water in a dream. If the dreamer sees dirty water in a dream, it may indicate fatigue and anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees dirty, black water in a dream, this may indicate To broken family relationships, and God knows best. If a young man sees dirty water in a dream, it may indicate bad things, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a neighbor’s house drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a neighbor’s house drowning in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing the house sinking in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the house sinking in a dream, this may indicate bad things, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the house sinking in a dream, she can To express her sadness and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a house being drowned in rainwater in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a house being drowned in rainwater in a dream. The difference may be expressed by crying in the rain due to negligence in religious duties, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if a married woman sees her house drowning in water Rain in a dream, this may be a sign of good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see foul-smelling rainwater in a dream, it could be a sign of a problem, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about flooding agricultural land with water in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about flooding agricultural lands with water in a dream. Scientists have not found meanings. Specific to that, however, seeing the earth watered in a dream could be a sign of justice, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen watering the earth, this may lead to the strength of faith, and God knows the unseen. If a girl sees herself in a dream watering plants, perhaps this symbolizes kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Problems for the child, God willing. Therefore, if a married man sees a child drowning, this may indicate trouble, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing.
